data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article dos Santos, Maria Dulcineia Sales, Porto, Tiago Jordao, Lira-da-Silva, Rejane Maria, Brazil, Tania Kobler (2014): Description of the male of Tityus kuryi Lourenco, 1997 and notes about males of Tityus stigmurus (Thorell, 1877) and Tityus serrulatus Lutz & Mello, 1922 (Scorpiones, Buthidae). ZooKeys 435: 49-61, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.435.6694, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.435.6694
